news.body: IALR 1.6i5 supports the latest version of DL2. Please report bugs on the Discord ialr-dl2-bug-reporting channel, thanks and happy gaming

The new event is causing crashes due to being forced for some players even if you turned community events off. Install only the base difficulty for the mod without any modules, events, etc and try to play in Offline mod in steam.
The new 3.0 Launcher is out! Make sure to grab the latest launcher
Use the mod config page to modify and create your own mods! Save your changes to a custom config and apply after any official update.
A new official version of IALR is released, stay tuned for more features coming soon!
Make sure to check out the installer to see all the latest modules, events, and pathways!
Make sure to check out the full release notes on the discord if you would like to help with the translations

The DoomsDay Prepper and Apex Predator have a new skin each for Pathways, select a pathway and then start a new game to check out their new items and skins. You can equip these skins any time from the Stash Extras section, but won't get the items that come with starting with a new pathway. All items given can be found ingame with IALR.
I Am Legion will be coming to The Beast when it is released so stay tuned.
Development on IALR will continue after the tools have been finished. A large amount of the data support has been completed, but the individual tools are still under development.
